item.title: S1万能，求一份3DS恶魔幸存者2断码全配信解锁了的日版存档[0-50]
item.description:
S1万能，求一份3DS恶魔幸存者2断码全配信解锁了的日版存档 https://i.loli.net/2019/07/31/5d409f5288e9f62164.png
Fusion pack 1 - Fallen Dantalian, Touki Momunofu. Megami Ishtar, Fairy Troll, Fairy Spriggan, Avian Kau
Fusion pack 2 - Tyrant Lucifer Frost, Divine Dominion, Jaki Dokkaebi, Genma Roltschaggata, Wilder Catoblepas, Kishin Okuninushi
Fusion pack 3 - Vile Seth, Drake Fafnir, Tyrant Lucifuge, Megami Black maria, Touki Ongyo-ki, Beast Cabracan
Fusion pack 4 - Fiend Mother hariot, Avian Rukh, Femme Jahi, Haunt Macabre, Divine Suraosha, Snake Yurlungur
The last is add-ons content. I think it has 4 Add-ons skill.
外加一个无头三角色的配信，哪也找不到了
https://gbatemp.net/threads/devil-survivor-2-record-breaker-obtain-durarara-characters-by-save-editing.469786/
gbatemp找到的替换法日版用不了，估计贴吧搜能找到点什么，然而13年的游戏17年帖子目前全隐藏状态，多玩也挂了
估计不会再妇科了，求提取份，存档编号是00000c3a

johanliebert:
S1万能，求一份3DS恶魔幸存者2断码全配信解锁了的日版存档

Fusion pack 1 - Fallen Dantalian, Touki Momunofu. Megami Ishtar, Fairy Troll, Fairy Spriggan, Avian Kau
Fusion pack 2 - Tyrant Lucifer Frost, Divine Dominion, Jaki Dokkaebi, Genma Roltschaggata, Wilder Catoblepas, Kishin Okuninushi
Fusion pack 3 - Vile Seth, Drake Fafnir, Tyrant Lucifuge, Megami Black maria, Touki Ongyo-ki, Beast Cabracan
Fusion pack 4 - Fiend Mother hariot, Avian Rukh, Femme Jahi, Haunt Macabre, Divine Suraosha, Snake Yurlungur
The last is add-ons content. I think it has 4 Add-ons skill.
外加一个无头三角色的配信，哪也找不到了
https://gbatemp.net/threads/devil-survivor-2-record-breaker-obtain-durarara-characters-by-save-editing.469786/
gbatemp找到的替换法日版用不了，估计贴吧搜能找到点什么，然而13年的游戏17年帖子目前全隐藏状态，多玩也挂了
估计不会再妇科了，求提取份，存档编号是00000c3a
